verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%>, <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3870>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4236>meekness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1932>gentleness<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; I <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2596>in<s%> your <S%G4383>presence<s%> <S%G3303>am<s%> <S%G5011>lowly<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> being <S%G548>absent<s%> I am <S%G2292>bold<s%> <S%G1519>towards<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>:

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G1189>beg<s%> <S%G2292>you<s%>, that I may <S%G3361>not<s%> be <S%G2292>bold<s%> when I am <S%G3918>present<s%> with that <S%G4006>confidence<s%>, with which I <S%G3049>intend<s%> to be <S%G5111>bold<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3049>think<s%> of <S%G2248>us<s%> as <S%G5613>if<s%> we <S%G4043>walked<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>.

<S%G1063>(For<s%> the <S%G3696>weapons<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4752>warfare<s%> are <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4559>carnal<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1415>mighty<s%> through <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the pulling <S%G2506>down<s%> of strong <S%G3794>holds<s%>;)

Casting <S%G2507>down<s%> <S%G3053>imaginations<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> high <S%G5313>thing<s%> that exalts <S%G1869>itself<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> bringing into <S%G163>captivity<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3540>thought<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G5218>obedience<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>;

Do you <S%G991>look<s%> on <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the outward <S%G4383>appearance<s%>? <S%G1487>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3982%G99999>trusts<s%> that he <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s, let <S%G3049%G99999%G99999>him<s%> <S%G3049>consider<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> are <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>'s.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437%G99999>though<s%> I should <S%G2744%G99999>boast<s%> <S%G5100>somewhat<s%> <S%G4053>more<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G3619>edification<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2506>destruction<s%>, I <S%G153>should<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G153>ashamed<s%>:

<S%G3754>For<s%> his <S%G3303>letters<s%>, say <S%G5346>they<s%>, are <S%G926>weighty<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2478>powerful<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> his <S%G4983>bodily<s%> <S%G3952>presence<s%> is <S%G772>weak<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G1848>contemptible<s%>.

<S%G3049>Let<s%> such a <S%G5108>one<s%> <S%G3049>consider<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, such <S%G3634>as<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> in <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1992>letters<s%> when we are <S%G548>absent<s%>, <S%G5108>such<s%> will we be <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G2041>deed<s%> when we are <S%G3918>present<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2744>will<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G280>beyond<s%> our <S%G280>limits<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of the <S%G2583>ruler<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G3307>distributed<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%>, a <S%G3358>measure<s%> to <S%G2185>reach<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G891>to<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G5239>stretch<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G5239>beyond<s%> our <S%G5613>measure<s%>, as though we <S%G3361>didn<s%>'t <S%G2185>reach<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> we have <S%G5348>come<s%> as far <S%G891>as<s%> to <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> preaching the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

<S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G2744>boasting<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G280>beyond<s%> our <S%G280>measure<s%>, that <S%G1722>is<s%>, of other <S%G245>men<s%>'s <S%G2873>labors<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>, when <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G837>increased<s%>, that we shall be <S%G3170>enlarged<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2583>measurement<s%> <S%G4050>abundantly<s%>,

To preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the regions <S%G5238>beyond<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, and <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G2744>boast<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> another <S%G245>man<s%>'s <S%G2583>measurement<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> things given into our <S%G2092>hand<s%>.
